scripts.install:all: npm install && npm --prefix shared run build
scripts.dev: concurrently -n emu,api,web -c cyan,green,magenta "npm run emu:clean" "sleep 5 && npm run dev:api" "sleep 6 && npm run dev:web"
scripts.dev:win: concurrently -n api,web -c green,magenta "npm run dev:api" "npm run dev:web"
scripts.build: npm --prefix shared run build && npm --prefix apps/api run build && npm --prefix apps/web run build
